IP2025020_syn_1:
Indication: Severe asthma, session 2.
Procedure: Bronchial Thermoplasty (LLL).
Action: 48 activations delivered to LLL.
Complication: Transient bronchospasm.
Plan: D/C on prednisone taper.
IP2025020_syn_2:
PROCEDURE: Bronchial Thermoplasty, second session.
TARGET: Left Lower Lobe.
DETAILS: Following the protocol for severe refractory asthma, the left lower lobe was selected for treatment. The thermoplasty catheter was deployed to the distal subsegmental bronchi. A total of 48 radiofrequency activations were delivered. The patient tolerated the procedure with only transient bronchospasm.

IP2025020:
Interventional Pulmonology Procedure Note
Procedure: Bronchial thermoplasty session 2 treating left lower lobe.
Patient: [REDACTED], 52-year-old male with severe asthma status post RLL BT.
Sedation: Monitored anesthesia care with propofol and dexmedetomidine.
Procedure details: Flexible bronchoscopy performed with BT catheter treatment of LLL segmental and subsegmental bronchi. Total of 48 activations delivered.
Complications: Transient bronchospasm requiring additional bronchodilator therapy; no respiratory failure.
Disposition: Observed 6 hours and discharged home on prednisone taper.
